item.title: Webscrapping a weather detailing website
item.description: https://www.estesparkweather.net/archive_reports.php EstesPark Weather website lists weather data for the selected month of a year. Used BeautifulSoup to extract information. Created Dataframe containing data from january 2009 to december 2022. Data available on website Creating dataframe out of website information https://github.com/mounicayelchuri/WebScrapping/blob/main/Web%20scrapping%20project.ipynb
